 
<div component-loaded dib-container="tmplGridNgSql" dib-grid  dib-config="{ }" >
	<md-toolbar aria-label="toolbar" can-be-moved=true can-have-children=true flex=none layout-wrap style="    " id='ci154585' aria-label="toolbar" dib-container-name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
		<div class="md-toolbar-tools">
			<md-button aria-label="btnreload" can-be-moved=true flex=none class="md-icon-button md-squared md-raised" style="    " ng-click="reloadContainer({'force' : true})" id='ci156285' aria-label="btnreload" dib-container-name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
				<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
					Reload records
				</md-tooltip>
				<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibGlobals/images/svg/reload.svg">
				</md-icon>
			</md-button>
			<span flex=auto aria-label="emptyspan" can-be-moved=true flex=none style="    " id='ci166984' aria-label="emptyspan" dib-container-name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
			</span>
			<md-button aria-label="btnfilteropen" can-be-moved=true flex=none class="md-icon-button md-squared md-raised" style="    " ng-click="showSearch = !showSearch"  id='ci166985' aria-label="btnfilteropen" dib-container-name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
				<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
					Display headers for filtering records
				</md-tooltip>
				<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibGlobals/images/svg/search.svg">
				</md-icon>
			</md-button>
			<md-button aria-label="btnfilterapply" can-be-moved=true flex=none class="md-icon-button md-squared md-raised" style="    " ng-click="searchGrid()" id='ci166986' aria-label="btnfilterapply" dib-container-name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
				<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
					Apply filter criteria specified in grid headers
				</md-tooltip>
				<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibGlobals/images/svg/applyFilters.svg">
				</md-icon>
			</md-button>
			<md-button aria-label="btnfilterclear" can-be-moved=true flex=none class="md-icon-button md-squared md-raised" style="    " ng-click="clearSearch()" id='ci166987' aria-label="btnfilterclear" dib-container-name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
				<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
					Show all records and clear filter criteria
				</md-tooltip>
				<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibGlobals/images/svg/cancelFilters.svg">
				</md-icon>
			</md-button>
			<div aria-label="gridtotals" can-be-moved=true flex=none layout="row" style="    " id='ci169025' aria-label="gridtotals" dib-container-name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" ng-if="page.fromRecord >
				-1" >
				<md-button ng-disabled="true" aria-label="Grid totals">
					Records: {{page.fromRecord}}
					<span ng-if='page.fromRecord>
						0'>
						to {{page.toRecord}} of {{page.records}}
					</span>
					<span ng-if='page.totalRecords!=page.records'>
						(Total: {{page.totalRecords}})
					</span>
				</md-button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</md-toolbar>
	<md-progress-linear md-mode="indeterminate" ng-if="loadingData" class="dib-data-loading">
	</md-progress-linear>
	<div flex dib-table-width >
		<md-list class='dib-grid-column-header'>
			<md-list-item class="md-1-line _md-no-proxy dib-table-header dib-inline-edit" >
				<div layout="row" flex="100" dib-grid-search  ng-show="!loadingData">
				</div>
			</md-list-item>
		</md-list>
	</div>
	<md-content  fill-height footer-element='.dib-grid-footer' class='dib-grid-column-content'>
		<md-list dib-table-column-width >
			<md-list-item ng-if="gridData.length == 0"  layout-align="center center">
				<div class="no-records-available">
					  No records available 
				</div>
			</md-list-item>
			<md-list-item class="md-1-line _md-no-proxy " ng-repeat="row in gridData"  ng-class="{ 'md-custom-accent' : row.___selected, 'first-record-padding' : $index==0 && row.___editing }" ng-click="selectRow(row, $event)"   >
				<ng-form name='tmplGridNgSql' dib-container-name="tmplGridNgSql" isolate-form layout="row" flex="100" dib-inline-edit="closed" layout-align="start start" ng-enter='saveRow($event,row)' >
				</ng-form>
			</md-list-item>
		</md-list>
	</md-content>
	<div layout-fill layout='row' flex class='dib-grid-footer'>
		<div flex=20 layout='row'>
			<md-button disabled>
				Page limit
			</md-button>
			<md-select ng-model="page.limit">
				<md-option ng-value="10">
					10
				</md-option>
				<md-option ng-value="20">
					20
				</md-option>
				<md-option ng-value="50">
					50
				</md-option>
			</md-select>
		</div>
		<div  ng-if="page.count>
			1" flex=80 layout='row'  layout-align="center center" >
			<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='firstPage()'>
				First 
			</md-button>
			<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='previousPage()'>
				Prev 
			</md-button>
			<div layout='row'>
				<md-button disabled>
					Page
				</md-button>
				<md-input-container>
					<input type='number' ng-model="page.number" aria-label="Page number">
				</md-input-container>
				<md-button disabled>
					of {{ page.count }} 
				</md-button>
			</div>
			<md-button ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='nextPage()'>
				Next 
			</md-button>
			<md-button  ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='lastPage()'>
				Last 
			</md-button>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
